interestingcomments.content:
Alternative to Nikon WMU app? /!/ I have a D750 and use [Nikon's WMU app](https://www.nikonusa.com/en/nikon-products/wireless-mobile-utility-app.page), which is very poorly implemented. There are so many ways it is bad. For example, to take consecutive images from the app with a timer, you have go to settings and turn the timer back on after every shot.

Is there an alternative to this app?

interestingcomments.content:
App recommendation: need an android app that works on large smart TV, allows WiFi connection to DSLR /!/ Hi all, newbie with DSLR WiFi apps. Have tried half a dozen apps to be able to get my Nikon D7500 to connect to android smart TV. 

I've tried sideloading multiple apps on the smart TV and they all appear not to be set up for landscape.... Only work on portrait mode which does not display correctly on the android device.

Anyone know of a decent app that can work in landscape? I just want to WiFi connect and display recent pics to large 65" screen. I can do it via HDMI, but want WiFi.

Here's what I mean with e.g. Nikon connect app

https://images.app.goo.gl/9S1TAfXV2Pe3RrMc9
